version.author: Mantrika Sound
version.changelog: v0.0.8.1-beta (2025-12-23) + Fixed visual noise issue in Mirror + Fixed bug that unexpectedly cleared track names + SampleBroker: Switched to native system context menu + AutoTrackColor: Optimized track traversal performance + FX Search: Improved UX, performance, and search algorithm --Mantrika Team
